tutorial_lead_card_description: Here you can view and manage lead data
tutorial_lead_button_description: Click 'Add Client' and fill in the basic details: name, phone, lead source, and responsible manager. The more information you provide, the easier it is to work with the client
tutorial_lead_status_description: Move client cards through statuses (e.g., 'New' ‚Üí 'In Progress' ‚Üí 'Client')
tutorial_lead_details_history_descriptio: Action history (client, related Event s, deals)
tutorial_lead_details_edit_description: Here you can edit the lead
tutorial_lead_details_delete_description: An important tool for keeping your database organized.
tutorial_lead_details_chat_description: If integrations (WhatsApp, Telegram, Instagram, Email) are connected, communicate with the client directly in the CRM. All correspondence will be saved in the client's card
tutorial_lead_details_notice_description: Record important events (calls, meetings, agreements) in the client‚Äôs card. This helps track interaction history
tutorial_lead_details_deal_title: Creating a deal directly from the client‚Äôs card
tutorial_lead_details_deal_description: Click 'Add' in the client‚Äôs card to quickly process a deal and link it to the client
tutorial_task_card_description: Here you can view details and manage tasks
tutorial_task_button_description: Click 'Create Task', enter the title, deadline, and assign a responsible person. The more precise the description, the easier it is for the executor
tutorial_task_status_description: Tasks can be moved between statuses (e.g., 'In Progress' ‚Üí 'Under Review' ‚Üí 'Completed'). This helps track progress
tutorial_task_screen_search_description: Use the search bar to quickly find a task by name
tutorial_task_screen_menu_description: Here you will find the Filter and the 'My tasks' section. Use filters to find tasks by due date, status, priority, and assignee. This way you can quickly find the task you need. In the 'My tasks' section, these are the tasks you created
tutorial_task_details_edit_description: Here you can change task data
tutorial_task_details_delete_description: An important tool for keeping your database organized.
tutorial_task_details_chat_description: Discuss task details with colleagues directly in the comments. The message history is saved, so all information is always at hand
tutorial_deal_edit_description: Editing: You can modify the deal data to keep it up-to-date. Deletion: An important tool for database order.
tutorial_deal_tasks_description: Linking tasks to the deal (e.g., 'Send Commercial Proposal', 'Sign Contract'). Tracking task completion by deal.
tutorial_deal_history_description: Here you can view the deal change history.
dealCardDescription: Here you can view and manage deal data.
statusManagementDescription: Moving the deal through statuses (e.g., 'New' ‚Üí 'In Progress' ‚Üí 'Successful').
addDealDescription: Click "Add Deal" and fill in the basic information: name, amount, description, and responsible manager. The more information you provide, the easier it is to work with the client.
tutorial_task_details_review_description: Here you can send the task for review
tutorial_task_details_history_descriptio: Here you can view the task's action history
tutorial_chat_lead_description: All incoming messages from leads are automatically displayed here. The ability to reply to messages directly in the system without the need to open third-party applications
tutorial_chat_task_description: Discussion of task details, file sharing, etc.
tutorial_chat_corporate_description: Designed for internal employee communication within the CRM system. It allows teams to interact, share information, and discuss work-related issues in real time
tutorial_dashboard_notification_descript: Here you can find notifications about new messages from clients, tasks, deals
tutorial_dashboard_mytask_description: Here are the tasks you have created
tutorial_dashboard_lead_conversion_descr: The chart displays the percentage of leads from inquiries that became clients. These are clients who contacted and gradually moved from the 'Unknown' status to the 'Client' status.
tutorial_dashboard_task_completion_descr: The graph shows task completion rates for all your employees. It reflects the percentage of completed tasks for each employee.
tutorial_dashboard_task_chart_descriptio:
The chart is divided into three parts:
üîµ Blue ‚Äì tasks in progress.
üî¥ Red ‚Äì overdue tasks.
üü¢ Green ‚Äì completed tasks.
Pay attention to the red zone to respond to overdue tasks on time.
tutorial_dashboard_graphics_description: The graph allows you to see client dynamics for each month. It visualizes client statuses set in the 'Counterparties' section, helping to analyze changes in the client base over time.
tutorial_dashboard_lead_process_speed_de: The graph visualizes the speed and quality of client processing. Determine at what level your client interactions are: from slow to highly active.
tutorial_dashboard_deal_stats_descriptio:
The graph is divided into two parts:
üîµ Blue: shows total deal amounts for the month.
üü¢ Green: shows the amount of successful deals.
Monitor monthly sales volume. Analyze performance and plan future actions.
tutorial_dashboard_user_goal_completion_: The graph shows the completion of your tasks. It reflects the percentage of tasks you have completed.
tutorial_profile_organization_descriptio: If you have multiple organizations, you can switch between them.
tutorial_profile_edit_description: The 'Profile' section allows users to view and edit their personal information, as well as their role in the system.
tutorial_profile_language_description: You can choose the interface language that is convenient for you.
tutorial_profile_pin_description: You can change the PIN code.
tutorial_profile_logout_description: When pressed, application data is cleared and the account is logged out.
tutorial_profile_toggle_feature_descript: You can add leads from your phone book and export leads to your address book.
tutorial_profile_update_1c_description: You can update data from the 1C system.
tutorial_profile_support_chat_descriptio: You can ask a question to support service via chat.
tutorial_lead_screen_search_description: Use the search bar to quickly find a lead by name, phone number, email, or contacts.
tutorial_lead_screen_menu_description: Here you will find a filter to sort clients. The 'Events' section (notes related to the client) and the 'My Tasks' section are highlighted separately. The 'My Tasks' section contains tasks created by you.
tutorial_deal_screen_search_description: Use the search bar to quickly find a deal by name, phone number, or lead name.
tutorial_deal_screen_menu_description: Here you will find a filter to sort deals. The 'Events' section (notes related to the client) and the 'My Tasks' section are highlighted separately. The 'My Tasks' section contains tasks created by you.
events_in_progress_description: Here are stored events that are in progress
completed_events_description: Here are stored events that have already been completed
tutorial_event_screen_search_description: Use the search bar to quickly find Event s
tutorial_deal_delete_description: An important tool for keeping your database organized.
tutorial_Notice_edit_description: Update the data and save changes.
tutorial_Notice_delete_description: An important tool for keeping your database organized.
tutorial_Notice_Finish_description: Needed to update events in CRM. When clicking the button, you will need to write a conclusion and complete the event.
addEventDescription: Notes help record important information about client interactions: details of meetings or agreements.
tutorial_event_screen_filtr_description: Set up filters to narrow down the list of events.
has_price_characteristics_description: If enabled, category characteristics will affect product price formation

please_select_image_one: Please select at least one image!
please_add_variant: Please add at least one variant with characteristics!
failed_to_find_common_images: Failed to find common images. Please reselect images!
please_select_product: Please select at least one product
confirm_delete_order: Are you sure you want to delete this order?
show_as_description: If enabled, the category will be displayed as a product; otherwise, as a characteristic
enter_notification_message: Enter customer notification text when order changes to this status
confirm_delete_status: Are you sure you want to delete this status?
confirm_manager_message: Are you sure you want to become the manager of this lead?
manager_assigned_success: You have successfully become the manager of this lead!

name_too_short: The name field must not be shorter than three characters
